document_data.name: High Axes Hall
document_data.mainbody: The '''High Axes Hall''' was a non-denominational temple in [[Myth Drannor]] that was dedicated the [[dwarven]] gods collectively known as the [[Morndinsamman]].{{Template:Cite book/Cormanthyr: Empire of the Elves|75}}
document_data.Location: It was located on the southern edge of Myth Drannor's [[Sheshyrinnam]] district, at the intersection between the [[Stroll of Minstrels]] and [[Withercloak Street]].{{Template:Cite book/Cormanthyr: Empire of the Elves/Map}}
document_data.Interior:
The ground floor of the temple held a central place of worship that housed statues of each of the deities of the dwarven pantheon. Beyond this chamber separate chapels for each individual deity, along with an underground cavern for the worship of [[Dumathoin]].

The top two floors housed the clerical rooms and residences for the dwarven priests.
document_data.History: The temple was built out of a renovated villa that once belonged to one of the city's noble families.
